Translations.Text: buhwal-ui nal-eul dugo naega maengsekeondae
geuligo magsimhi huhoehaneun yeonghon-eul dugo naega maengsekeondae
ingan-eun naega geuui ppyeoleul mo-euji anh-eul geos-ilago saeng-gaghaneunga
geuleohji anhnola. naneun geuui songalag-eul hanalo mandeul-eobeolil su issnola
geuleona ingan-eun apjangseoseo saagham-eul jeojileugil wonhadeola
geuga mul-euni "buhwal-ui nal-eun eonjelan mal-inga
sigag-i neogs-eul ilhgo
dal-i bich-eul ilh-eumyeo
haewa dal-i gyeobchyeojil ttae
ingan-eun geunal malhal geos-ila : "domangchil gos-eun eodiinga
geuleohji anhnola. pisincheolan eobsnola
geunal-eun geudaeui junim-i jeongchagjila
ingan-eun geunal jagiga naenoh-eun geosgwa neujchun geos-eul tongbo bad-eul geos-ila
sillo ingan-eun hwagsilhan jeung-geoga jagi jasin-eul deopchil geos-ila
geuga jagi byeonmyeong-eul neul-eonohdeolado geuleohal geos-ila
geudaeneun geugeos(kkulan)eul iyulo geudaeui hyeoleul geubhi umjig-yeo seoduleuji malla
sillo geugeos(kkulan)ui bojongwa nangsong-eun naui chaeg-im-ila
geuleoni naega geugeos(kkulan)eul ilg-eumyeon geu nangsong-eul ttaleula
geu hu geugeos(kkulan)ui seolmyeong-eun naui chaeg-im-ila
gyeolko geuleohji anhnola! geudaedeul-eun hyeonseleul salanghamyeonseo
naeseneun naebeolyeodudeola
geunal pogeunhan eolguldeul-i iss-euni
geudeul-ui junim-eul balabol geos-ila
geunal jjing-geulin eolguldeul-i iss-euni
jasindeul-ege jaeang-i deopchil geos-ila hwagsinhadeola
geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(yeonghon)i bisjangppyeoe dodalhaess-eul ttae
geuligo salamdeul-i "jumun-eul oewojul janeun nugu-inga?" lago malhal ttae
geuligo geuga geugeos-i sabyeol(sabyeol)ila hwagsinhal ttae
goeloum-i goeloumgwa majdah-eul ttae
geunal mollyeo gal gos-eun geudae junim-ila
geulihayeo geuneun midji anh-assgo yebaeleul deulijido anh-ass-euni
ohilyeo geuneun bu-inhamyeo dol-aseossnola
geu hu geuneun yangbangeol-eum-eul geol-eumyeo jagi gajog-egelo naagassnola
geudaeege jaeang-i gakkawossdoda. tto gakkawossdoda
dasi hanbeon, geudaeege jaeang-i gakkawossdoda. tto gakkawossdoda
ingan-eun jasin-i guaebadji anhgo naebeolyeojil geos-ila saeng-gaghaneunga
geuneun bunchulhaneun jeong-aeg bang-ul-iji anh-assdeonga
geuleon hu geuneun eunghyeol-ieoss-eumyeo geu hu geubunkkeseoneun mandeusigo gyunhyeong-eul jab-eusyeossnola
geu hu geubunkkeseoneun geulobuteo ssang-eul dusini namjawa yeojala
geuleohan bunkkeseo jug-eun jadeul-eul sallisil su eobsdan mal-inga
ingan-eun sigan-ui heuleum sog-eseo eongeubjocha doeji anhdeon sigiga issji anh-assdeonga
sillo naneun ingan-eul honhabdoen bang-ullobuteo changjohayeossgo geuleul siheomhani geuleul deudgo boneun jalo dueossnola
sillo naneun geuege gil-eul galikyeo jueoss-euni (geuneun) gamsahaneun jageona bulsinhaneun jadeola
sillo naneun bulsinjadeul-ege saseulgwa meong-ewa hwayeom-eul junbihae dueossnola
sillo sin-ang-in-eun suljan-eul masineunde geugeos-e seokk-in geos-eun jangnoela
hananim-ui jongbogdeul-eun geugeos(jangnoe)i majdah-eun umul-eul masini geudeul-eun geugeos(umul)eul pungseonghi gilleonaedeola
geudeul-eun maengse-ui mal-eul junsuhamyeo, saagham-i mol-achil geunal-eul dulyeowohago
bul-uhan jawa goawa polo-ege jasin-i aechaghaneun eumsig-eul judeola
uliga geudaedeul-ege eumsig-eul jum-eun ojig hananim-ui eolgul-eul wiham-imyeo ulineun geudaedeullobuteo bosang-ina gamsado wonhaji anhnola
sillo ulineun eolgul-eul jjipulyeoya hal heomnanhan nal-e uliui junim-eul dulyeowohanola
geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun geunal-ui saagham-eulobuteo geudeul-eul guhae jusyeoss-eumyeo geudeul-i pogeunhamgwa jeulgeoum-eul yeongjeobtolog haejusyeossnola
geuligo geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-ui innaee daehae bosanghasyeoss-euni cheonguggwa bidan-ila
geugos-eseo geudeul-eun chayang-i deuliwojin chimdae wie mom-eul gidaego, geugos-eseo geudeul-eun taeyang-eul boji anh-eumyeo doenchuwido eobsnola
geugos-ui geuneul-eun geudeul-ege deuliwojyeo iss-eumyeo geugos-ui gwasil-eun (ttagiga) maeu suwolhaejyeo issnola
eun-eulo doen geuleusgwa tumyeonghan keob-i geudeul juwileul doni
eun-eulo doen tumyeonghan keob-euloseo geudeul-eun geugeos(keob)eul jeogdanghan yang-eulo jojeolhanola
geuligo geudeul-eun geugos-eseo suljan-eulo masil geoliga jueojineunde geugeos-e seokk-in geos-eun saeng-gang-imyeo
geugos-eseo 'salsabil'ilaneun ileum-ui umul-eul masinola
